VIII.iv.4.B.2.e
.
SMC Under PL 86-663
PL 86-663
, effective September 1, 1960, created a new level of SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(s)
.  SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(k)
was not payable in addition to SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(s)
.
Note
:  If the additional 60-percent disability establishing entitlement at the “s” level included entitlement under
38 U.S.C. 1114(k)
, payment was to be made at the 100 percent + “k” level, as this was a greater benefit than the 100 percent + “s” level.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B - History of Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
